name: Appeal
text: [§342P-27]  Appeal.  If any party is aggrieved by the decision of the director, the party may appeal in the manner provided in chapter 91 to the circuit environmental court of the circuit in which the party resides or has the party's principal place of business or in which the action in question occurred; provided that the operation of a cease and desist order shall not be stayed on appeal unless specifically ordered by [an] environmental court of competent jurisdiction. [L 1991, c 219, pt of §1; am L 2014, c 218, §8]
